english: Sir, has he perhaps gone on an assignment? It's

Bamsi is entrusted to our care. We absolutely must

Send word to the Alps quickly.

(Suspense music)
(Suspense music)
My whip is worn out from hitting you.

Now, tell me.
How did Ertuğrul infiltrate you into our ranks?

text: Yanlış ata kement atmaya çalışırsın Alıncak.

That's why it always...
...falls to nothing. I have

And
... I'm Mongolian too.

While you could be the master of the world...
... you're a fool who acts like a dog to those we've subjugated...

text: ...ben senin yalanlarına kanacak kadar ahmak değilim.
english: ...I'm not foolish enough to fall for your lies.
(Alıncak) Now...
...you will tell us how Ertuğrul betrayed you...
...who was behind it...
...what information he obtained
Where is Keykavus and the chest?
Where?
(Upbeat music) If

...and tell me where they are, I will spare your life...
...and make you my own soldier. I

A resilient man like you...
...will always be useful to me.

(Speaking in Mongolian)
Know a lot...
...speak little. I have
no connection whatsoever with Ertuğrul. That's all
I have to say...

text: ...hangi malûmatları aldığını senden söke söke öğreneceğim.

Solve this!

Even the devils won't be able to find us there. I'll make

(Suspense music...)
Sir.

Ertuğrul...

Hulagu's commander...

text: ...zorbalıkla geldiği Söğüt'te gırtlağına kadar çamura boğdu.

(Dragos)
drove her away by making her sink as she struggled... ...and by his games.

Alıncak...
... licked up in shame everything he had arrogantly spat out. Isn't

Beybolat!

A powerful warrior.

(Artuk) My lord...

? If

Uranus? What

(Dragos) If you partner with me...

Keep it short. Tell me everything

Bamsi? Sir

Allah bless. When I think of

Thanks.

Since that day,
the oath we swore

's sit down, sir. Let's sit down now!
-Thanks. -May God bless my brave men.

(Dragos) By playing with his sister's feelings...
...he drove a wedge between you and Emir Bahaddin.
(Dragos) knew that tax gold was being smuggled out of the caravanserai while this dirty game was being played
(Dragos) In this way, without getting his hands bloody...

taken by the Mongols. Do you think he killed
my father...

(Dragos) brought Alıncak to his knees and...

, thank you very much.

what else can we do but lend a hand?
